statements: SELECT * FROM team_schedule WHERE match_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT match_date, opponent FROM team_schedule WHERE venue = 'Stadium A';
SELECT venue, opponent FROM team_schedule WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2023-02-01' AND '2023-02-28';
SELECT * FROM team_schedule ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT venue FROM team_schedule;
SELECT * FROM team_schedule ORDER BY match_date DESC, venue ASC, opponent DESC
SELECT venue, match_date FROM team_schedule WHERE opponent = 'Team A'
SELECT opponent, COUNT(*) AS matches_played FROM team_schedule GROUP BY opponent ORDER BY matches_played DESC
SELECT * FROM team_schedule WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT venue FROM team_schedule
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, team_id FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT team_name FROM teams WHERE team_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT match_id, venue, opponent FROM matches ORDER BY match_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM teams
SELECT team_name, team_id FROM teams WHERE team_name = 'Manchester United'
SELECT * FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC
SELECT team_id, COUNT(*) AS num_matches FROM matches GROUP BY team_id
SELECT match_date, opponent FROM matches WHERE match_date = '2022-10-15' ORDER BY opponent
SELECT * FROM TeamSchedule;
SELECT match_date, opponent FROM TeamSchedule WHERE match_id = 1;
SELECT venue, opponent FROM TeamSchedule WHERE match_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT * FROM TeamSchedule WHERE opponent LIKE '%United%';
SELECT * FROM TeamSchedule ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TeamSchedule WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01' AND venue = 'Stadium A' ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT match_id, opponent FROM TeamSchedule WHERE opponent LIKE '%United%' ORDER BY match_date ASC;
SELECT match_id, venue_name FROM TeamSchedule JOIN Venues ON TeamSchedule.venue = Venues.venue_name WHERE venue_name = 'Stadium B';
SELECT match_id, date FROM MatchDates WHERE date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TeamSchedule WHERE opponent = 'Team C';
SELECT * FROM team_schedule;
SELECT team_name, coach FROM team;
SELECT venue_name, city FROM venue ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT opponent_name, country FROM opponent WHERE country='Spain';
SELECT match_date, venue, opponent FROM team_schedule WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM team_schedule WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01' AND venue = 'Stadium A';
SELECT team_name, coach FROM team WHERE coach = 'John Doe';
SELECT opponent_name, country FROM opponent WHERE country = 'France' ORDER BY opponent_name DESC;
SELECT t.team_name, ts.match_date, v.city FROM team t JOIN team_schedule ts ON t.team_id = ts.match_id JOIN venue v ON ts.venue = v.venue_name;
SELECT team_name, coach, COUNT(*) AS match_count FROM team t JOIN team_schedule ts ON t.team_id = ts.match_id GROUP BY team_name, coach HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM Matches;
SELECT match_id, match_date, opponent FROM Matches WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT venue, match_date FROM Matches WHERE venue LIKE '%Stadium%' ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_color FROM Teams ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, position, Teams.team_name FROM Players JOIN Teams ON Players.team_id = Teams.team_id;
SELECT * FROM Matches WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT match_id, venue FROM Matches WHERE opponent = 'Barcelona' ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT Teams.team_name, Players.player_name FROM Teams JOIN Players ON Teams.team_id = Players.team_id;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM Venues WHERE venue_id IN (SELECT venue_id FROM Matches WHERE match_date < '2022-06-01');
SELECT Teams.team_name, COUNT(Results.match_id) AS num_matches FROM Teams JOIN Results ON Teams.team_id = Results.team_id GROUP BY Teams.team_name ORDER BY num_matches DESC;
